input: Send a batch request to propose borrower changes for loan UUIDs 55555555-6666-7777-8888-999999999999 and 66666666-7777-8888-9999-000000000000, incorporating all checklist items and activities.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /ProposedLoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"LoanContractUUID": "55555555-6666-7777-8888-999999999999", "Checklistitems": [{"Code": "19", "Description": "Ensure all documents are verified"}], "Activities": [{"Code": "13"}]}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /ProposedLoanContractBorrowerPartyChangeRequest HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"LoanContractUUID": "66666666-7777-8888-9999-000000000000", "Checklistitems": [{"Code": "19", "Description": "Pending loan contract payoff request existence"}], "Activities": [{"Code": "13"}]}
